columns.text: Art Hotel in Pyrgos village in Santorini adopted Vincent Van Gogh words in order to paint the dream hotel: “I dream my painting and then I paint my dream”. For adults and gay oriented, Art hotel is design for those who love elegance, luxury, style and they are passionate for discovering the art. Art Hotel has elegant minimalistic all-white suites highlighting the artworks within each room. At the hotel you will also find a reception that is available 24 hours a day. As for the children? You are most encouraged to leave them back home for a few days and feel the carefree breeze of Santorini with nothing getting in the way! The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.

items.title: A&V Luxury Villa
items.description: Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort. Spacious and modern, built on three levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool, the villa offers privacy, without sacrificing the comforts found in a five-star hotel. It is the ideal setting for a lifetime trip for family get-togethers and parties of friends. Bright ample rooms are the main characteristic of the villa. Two fully equipped kitchens, a large living room and an elegant dining room allow the guests to gather and enjoy a traditional meal in the cozy atmosphere of the villa away from the daily crowd. Four comfortable bedrooms, each one featuring a king size bed and three fully renovated bathrooms (one for each level) are the perfect compromise to combine some privacy with the advantage of sharing a private luxury home with your love ones. The outdoor area features a private infinity pool, full sea views on the East coast of the island and an astonishing sunrise. A shaded lounge area under a pergola and sun beds and outdoor lighting for moonlight dinners.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista's A&V Luxury Villa is a spacious and modern villa built on 3 levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool. Perfect for family gatherings!

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort.

items.title: Dreams Luxury Suites
items.description: Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition. Three of the suites have a private pool and jacuzzi, and the Nefeli suite has just a jacuzzi. 4 Suites Dreams luxury suites have stayed true to the original style of the island and represent an inimitable sample of traditional Greek archi-tecture. These original houses were built more than 100 years ago, and restored in 2008. Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition. The offered accommodation options represent a new concept of sanctuary with a unique personality. The Suites were designed for the distinctive guest who is able to appreciate a singular kind of comfort, class, space and tranquility. These original houses, more than 100 years old,  have been restored and they incorporate modern amenities, while preserving the traditional architecture.
items.excerpt: Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano and sunset
Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival.

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition.

SEO.title: Art Hotel Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel Santorini, has elegant all-white suites, each one highlighting artworks. Bespoke services of the finest quality are available.
